title: Xiao Tu Tao Tao De Gu Shi- Hui Sheng
original_name: 小兔淘淘的故事- 回声
sinopse: There was a rabbit.It went playing.Then it went around a lake.It said some bad things.Then it heard echo.It thought there was someone saying some bad things to it but not the echo.Then it felt sad and scared so it went back home...
